# The `IncomingValueHandler` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Base class for ValueHandlers used for arguments coming into the current function, or for return values received from a call. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

Base class for ValueHandlers used for arguments coming into the current function, or for return values received from a call.
